name: hugo-tailbliss-site
description: Hugo static site with Tailbliss theme

scripts.clean:all: npm run clean && rm -rf node_modules package-lock.json
scripts.serve: npm run build && npx http-server public -p 8080 -c-1
scripts.serve:production: npm run build:production && npx http-server public -p 8080 -g
scripts.validate:html: npm run build:production && java -jar node_modules/vnu-jar/build/dist/vnu.jar --skip-non-html --also-check-css --format text ./public/
scripts.check:links: npm run build:production && npm run serve & sleep 5 && npx broken-link-checker http://localhost:8080 --recursive --ordered --exclude-external --filter-level 3; kill %1 2>/dev/null || true
scripts.lint: echo 'Linting not configured - consider adding markdownlint or similar'
scripts.test: npm run validate && npm run build:production && npm run validate:html
scripts.test:all: npm run test && npm run check:links && npm run test:lighthouse
scripts.precommit: npm run validate && npm run build:preview
scripts.deploy:test: npm run build:production && npm run serve:production
